backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing implemented Valentine features and the files involved.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML mounting point loading main.tsx for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the ValentineProposalExperience as the app's sole component.
frontend/src/features/particleSlideshow/: Canvas particle engine handling particle count, pixel sampling, animation states, and transitions.
Utility to scale and center images within a canvas while preserving aspect ratio.
Styles for the fullscreen particle slideshow, loading UI, and final text animation.
Loads an image, initializes the particle engine, shows a loading spinner, and reveals final text after animation.
Utility for asynchronously preloading images and returning them as HTMLImageElements.
frontend/src/features/valentine/componen: Creates falling emoji items and sparkles for the Yes celebration overlay.
Displays guy or cat character states based on No-click count with corresponding animations.
Glowing animated heart button used to advance to the particle slideshow.
frontend/src/features/valentine/motion.t: Defines shared animation timing, easing, delays, and a helper to generate CSS transition strings.
frontend/src/features/valentine/screens/: Renders the final love message screen with romantic text and a button that advances to the next step.
Displays a long emotional message and a heart button that triggers a callback.
Shows an interactive Valentine proposal with Yes/No logic, character reactions, and a celebration overlay.
frontend/src/features/valentine/valentin: Contains animations and styling for Valentine screens, floating hearts, character states, and romantic message layouts.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Valentin: Controls the four-step Valentine flow and switches between screens based on state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and a pastel Valentine color theme with custom fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom Valentine colors, fonts, animations, and extended utilities.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state and requirements for a romantic single‑page Valentine’s website with smooth animations, a multi‑step Yes/No story, and a canvas-based particle slideshow. Includes architectural notes, known issues, image requirements, and a list of existing features.
